Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO BUDGET AND REVENUE

Title: Enacts the "sustainable building materials act of 2025"
Summary: Enacts the "sustainable building materials act"; enacts into law components of legislation relating to reducing greenhouse gas emissions in construction; provides a sales tax exemption for certain low-carbon building materials (Part A); establishes a grant program for manufacturers of concrete for environmental product declarations (Part B).
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing a sales tax exemption for certain low-carbon building materials (Part A); to establish a grant program for manufacturers of concrete for environmental product declarations (Part B)
